Task Method Route Accepts Returns
Listing Data GET {{ template.storage }}.json Nothing A list of existing features
Creating a feature POST {{ template.storage }}.json A single feature The saved feature or errors
Getting a feature GET {{ template.storage }}/<ObjectId:feature_id>.json Nothing A single feature
Updating a feature PATCH {{ template.storage }}/<ObjectId:feature_id>.json A single feature The updated feature or errors
Updating a feature PUT {{ template.storage }}/<ObjectId:feature_id>.json A single feature The updated feature or errors
Deleting a feature DELETE {{ template.storage }}/<ObjectId:feature_id>.json A single feature Nothing
